abstract: The deal for American HealthCare Lending is part of Prosper’s push to expand its offerings as it continues a multiyear turnaround effort.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

snippet: The deal for American HealthCare Lending is part of Prosper’s push to expand its offerings as it continues a multiyear turnaround effort.

headline.main: After Year of Growth, Prosper Buys a Surgical Procedures Lender
